original_text: An unjust man is an abomination to the just: and he that is upright in the way is abomination to the wicked.
korean_text: 불의한 자는 의인에게 미움을 받고 바르게 행하는 자는 악인에게 미움을 받느니라

sentences.original_text: An unjust man is an abomination to the just
sentences.korean_translation: 불의한 사람은 의로운 사람에게 가증스러운 존재이다

sentences.original_text: and he that is upright in the way
